thread.title: DIY pumpkin foot scrub for fall
thread.title_full: DIY pumpkin foot scrub for fall | Examiner.com

author: Janel Lucas
title: DIY pumpkin foot scrub for fall
text:
Pumpkin www.pixabay.com Just because sandal season is over doesn't mean you should take a break from pampering your feet. Maintaining the health and beauty of your feet and toenails is just as important in the fall and winter months as it is during the spring and summer.
If you need a bit of motivation to get in the mood for a fall DIY pedicure, this DIY pumpkin foot scrub is the perfect pampering project. The following pumpkin foot scrub is a recipe from celebrity nail artist Skyy Hadley , owner of As U Wish Nail Salon. This DIY fall themed scrub is perfect for the season and has great benefits for the health and appearance of your feet.
Skyy explains, “Pumpkins are more than just for carving on Halloween,” she noted. “They’re rich in vitamins and nutrients and can do wonders for your feet!” They contain “various enzymes that help nourish and brighten the skin, and just by adding raw sugar you have a perfect foot scrub.”
The DIY pumpkin foot scrub includes five common ingredients and is quick and simple to make and apply. You can create and use your beauty enhancing foot scrub in just 4 simple steps.
DIY pumpkin foot scrub ingredients:
1 can pureed pumpkin
1 cup plain yogurt
½ cup raw sugar
2 tablespoons honey
1/4 teaspoon olive oil
Directions:
1. Mix pureed pumpkin in a bowl.
2. Stir in a yogurt, honey, sugar and olive oil.
3. Wash your feet in warm water, and while your feet are moist, apply the scrub using your hands in a circular motion.
4. Massage the mask onto your feet for 10 minutes on each foot and remove with warm water and a washcloth.
